pathways:
environmental factors influence personal cognitions and 
            emotional states, which in turn affect behavioral choices and outcomes

descriptive_explanatory.integration_pattern: Terms that both categorize and explain mechanisms

descriptive_predictive.integration_pattern: Terms that both categorize and serve as predictive measures

descriptive_causal.integration_pattern: Terms that both describe and determine causal relationships

descriptive_intervention.integration_pattern: Terms that both categorize and describe intervention methods

explanatory_predictive.integration_pattern: Terms that both explain mechanisms and enable prediction

explanatory_causal.integration_pattern: Terms that both explain how things work and show causal flow

explanatory_intervention.integration_pattern: Terms that both explain processes and guide implementation

predictive_causal.integration_pattern: Terms that both predict outcomes and identify causal relationships

predictive_intervention.integration_pattern: Terms that both predict results and measure intervention effects

causal_intervention.integration_pattern: Terms that both identify causes and suggest interventions

recommendations: Enhance identification of terms serving multiple purposes
